landing.top_1: Start your e-commerce journey now with Family Drop
landing.top_2: We provide all our marketers with comprehensive e-commerce services to meet your ambitions and achieve more revenue
landing.m_th2: Our platform offers innovative solutions suitable for ambitious youth, housewives, employees, entrepreneurs, and university students. It allows you to work from home, balancing family responsibilities while increasing your financial income. It also provides ideal opportunities for professional entrepreneurs to build their online projects without high startup costs. For university students, we offer platforms to build valuable experiences and increase income while studying. Join us and benefit from the flexibility of online work!
landing.m_1b: Professionals and entrepreneurs: Dive into the world of e-commerce without hefty startup costs. Invest in your skills and expand your business easily, without the need for a large capital.
landing.m_2b: All users: Get continuous support and comprehensive educational resources that enhance your e-commerce skills. From lessons and webinars to articles and guides, we help you achieve success in your project easily and confidently.
landing.m_3b: Housewives and employees: Enjoy managing your family responsibilities with the flexibility of working from home. Increase your financial income and achieve financial stability for your family without having to give up your household duties.
landing.m_4b: University students: Start your entrepreneurial journey while studying! Create your own online projects at low costs, earn extra income while gaining valuable skills that can enhance your professional future.
landing.m_r_t: A platform that guarantees your success
landing.m_r_b: At Family Drop, we place your success at the core of our priorities. We provide you with a complete team of experts to support you at every step, with advanced marketing tools and comprehensive logistical solutions. We are committed to providing exceptional customer service around the clock to ensure the growth and prosperity of your e-commerce business.
landing.w_q: What we offer you at Family Drop
landing.q_1: Will I need capital to start my business with Makhzen?
landing.an_1: You will not need capital as we provide you with products without the need to purchase, store, or ship them.
landing.q_2: How do I receive my profits in Makhzen?
landing.an_2: Makhzen offers you several different ways to transfer your profits.
landing.q_3: Can I market the products while I am outside of Jordan?
landing.an_3: Yes, you can! You do not need to be present in the country where you are marketing; you can work from any country.
landing.q_5: Is there a minimum limit for withdrawing profits?
landing.an_5: There is no minimum limit for withdrawing profits.
landing.q_4: When will my profits be transferred?
landing.an_4: You can withdraw your profits directly by submitting a request to withdraw your earnings.
landing.an_6: Currently, we provide dropshipping services only in Jordan.

dialog.rate: The profit percentage refers to the portion of the money that will be deducted and given to the marketer after completing the purchase process,It should be specified carefully.
dialog.acc: Confirming the order means that the product will stop being offered to marketers and you will be committed to delivering the products to the merchant.
